label: Facilities Management & Maintenance
description: Transforms reactive break-fix maintenance into predictive asset management with significant downtime reduction, faster repairs, and cost savings through IoT monitoring, AI predictions, and automated work order management.

traditionalApproach.description: Reactive maintenance with manual work orders, paper forms, and low preventive maintenance completion resulting in unplanned downtime and high costs.
characteristics: Equipment fails, then we fix (reactive)
Manual work order creation and assignment
No mobile access for technicians (paper-based)
Low preventive maintenance completion
Parts inventory not tracked (stockouts or excess)
Long mean time to repair
High unplanned downtime
constraints: Manual work order triage delays response
No asset performance data (which assets fail most?)
High maintenance cost per sq ft

contextualConstraints.content: Retail stores face constant equipment failures during peak hours, leading to lost sales and customer dissatisfaction from HVAC breakdowns and POS system outages.
Grocery chains struggle with refrigeration system maintenance, where failures result in significant food waste and compliance violations.
Travel facilities require 24/7 uptime for booking systems and security, where reactive maintenance leads to service disruptions and revenue loss.
QSR operations depend on reliable kitchen equipment, where breakdowns during peak hours cause long lines and customer abandonment.
Hotels need constant maintenance for guest rooms and common areas, where reactive approaches lead to guest complaints and booking cancellations.

agenticApproach.description: Predictive maintenance with IoT sensors detecting anomalies before failure, automated work orders, and mobile technician tools achieving significant operational improvements.
characteristics: IoT Sensor Monitoring Agent detects equipment anomalies
Predictive Maintenance Agent forecasts failure, creates work orders automatically
Work Order Routing Agent assigns to best-fit technician
Mobile Technician Agent provides troubleshooting guides and asset history
Parts Inventory Agent auto-orders when stock low
PM Scheduling Agent ensures high preventive maintenance completion
Asset Performance Agent analyzes failure patterns
benefits: Unplanned downtime significantly reduced through predictive maintenance
MTTR reduced through faster diagnosis and mobile access

projections.basis: TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on IoT sensors detecting equipment anomalies before failure and enabling predictive maintenance interventions']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on mobile technician tools with troubleshooting guides, asset history, and automated parts ordering']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on automated scheduling agents that prevent PM work orders from being skipped or delayed']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on shift from reactive to predictive maintenance reducing emergency repairs and extending asset life']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on predictive maintenance preventing catastrophic failures and optimizing replacement timing']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on mobile tools eliminating trips to office for work orders, parts lists, and asset history']

quickWins: Mobile app for technicians (immediate productivity gain)
Auto-assignment of work orders (reduce manual coordination)
PM calendar automation (ensure PMs not skipped)

label: Energy Management & Sustainability
description: Optimizes energy consumption and carbon footprint with significant cost savings and emission reductions through AI-powered HVAC/lighting control, demand response, and automated sustainability tracking.

traditionalApproach.description: Manual utility bill tracking with fixed HVAC schedules and no real-time visibility resulting in substantial energy waste and manual sustainability reporting.
characteristics: Utility bills reviewed monthly (too late to take action)
HVAC controlled by fixed schedules (on 6am, off 6pm)
Lighting controlled by manual switches
No real-time energy monitoring
Sustainability reporting manual (annual carbon footprint calculation)
High energy cost per sq ft (unoptimized)
Significant energy waste (lights/HVAC on unnecessarily)
constraints: HVAC and lighting run when buildings empty
Energy projects not prioritized by ROI

benchmarks.source: TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'BOMA Energy Cost Benchmarks 2024']
TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'EPA Energy Star Portfolio Manager data']

agenticApproach.description: AI-powered energy optimization with real-time monitoring, occupancy-based HVAC/lighting control, and automated sustainability tracking achieving significant cost and emission reductions.
characteristics: Energy Monitoring Agent tracks use in real-time by building/floor/equipment
HVAC Optimization Agent adjusts based on occupancy, weather, time
Lighting Control Agent dims/turns off when spaces unoccupied
Demand Response Agent reduces load during peak pricing
Utility Bill Validation Agent flags errors and anomalies
Sustainability Tracking Agent calculates carbon emissions automatically
Energy Project Prioritization Agent ranks initiatives by ROI

projections.basis: TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on AI-powered HVAC/lighting optimization responding to occupancy, weather, and time-of-use rates']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on reduced energy consumption through optimization and demand response during peak carbon intensity periods']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on occupancy-based controls preventing HVAC and lighting from running in empty spaces']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on demand response agent reducing peak load during high-cost periods']

prerequisites: Smart meters (or utility AMI data access)

label: Space Planning & Utilization
description: Optimizes workplace space with significant real estate cost savings and improved occupancy through real-time tracking, hoteling management, and AI-powered space planning.

traditionalApproach.description: Fixed space allocation with low occupancy and no tracking resulting in wasted real estate spend and poor employee experience.
characteristics: Office space allocation fixed by department
Low office occupancy (worse post-COVID)
Conference room booking via email (double-bookings common)
No space utilization tracking
Space planning based on headcount (1 desk per employee)
Move requests take weeks
High space cost per employee (unoptimized)
constraints: Conference rooms overbooked or sit empty
Assigned desks empty most of the time
No visibility into which spaces used when
Real estate costs high (paying for unused space)

benchmarks.source: TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'JLL Workplace Utilization Study 2024']
TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'CBRE Office Utilization Report 2024']
TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'Facilities management industry benchmarks']
TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'BOMA Real Estate Cost per Employee Benchmarks']

agenticApproach.description: Smart workplace management with real-time occupancy tracking, hoteling, and automated space planning achieving optimized occupancy and significant cost savings.
characteristics: Occupancy Tracking Agent monitors space usage via sensors and badge data
Hoteling Management Agent enables desk/office reservation via app
Conference Room Optimization Agent auto-releases no-show bookings
Space Planning Agent forecasts needs based on headcount and utilization
Move Management Agent automates move requests and coordination
Space Analytics Agent identifies underutilized space
Workplace Experience Agent helps employees find available space
benefits: Real estate costs reduced (smaller footprint, subleases)

projections.basis: TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on hoteling and flexible seating enabled by real-time occupancy tracking and reservation system']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on reduced footprint needs from higher occupancy and ability to sublease underutilized space']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on auto-release of no-show bookings and real-time availability visibility']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on automated move request workflow, coordination, and execution tracking']

label: Vendor & Contractor Management
description: Optimizes vendor relationships with faster onboarding, reduced invoice disputes, and cost savings through automated sourcing, performance tracking, and contract management.

traditionalApproach.description: Manual vendor management with slow onboarding, no performance tracking, and frequent invoice disputes resulting in compliance risks and missed savings.
characteristics: Vendor selection via informal RFP (email-based)
Contracts stored in filing cabinets or shared drives
Vendor performance not tracked systematically
Slow vendor onboarding
Frequent invoice disputes
Insurance certificates tracked in spreadsheet (low compliance)
No vendor spend analytics

TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'AP invoice processing benchmarks']
TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'Risk management compliance studies']

agenticApproach.description: AI-powered vendor management with automated onboarding, performance scorecards, and invoice validation achieving faster onboarding and cost savings.
characteristics: Vendor Sourcing Agent automates RFP process
Vendor Onboarding Agent collects documents and validates
Contract Management Agent tracks terms and renewals
Work Order Management Agent assigns and tracks vendor work
Invoice Validation Agent matches to contract rates
Insurance Compliance Agent tracks certificates and renewals
Vendor Scorecard Agent measures quality, cost, timeliness

label: Safety & Security Management
description: Enhances workplace safety and security with significant incident prevention, faster response, and AI video analytics through continuous monitoring, automated alerts, and predictive risk management.

traditionalApproach.description: Reactive security with manual patrols, paper incident reports, and periodic safety inspections resulting in delayed detection and preventable incidents.
characteristics: Security guards patrol manually (paper logs)
Incident reports handwritten on paper forms
Video surveillance reviewed after incident (reactive)
Access control basic (badge readers, manual tracking)
Safety training annual (low completion)
Safety inspections periodic (checklist, paper-based)
Long incident response time
Slow video search time
constraints: Reactive security (incidents reviewed after the fact)

benchmarks.source: TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'EHS training completion benchmarks']
TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'Security operations benchmarks']
TBD: [SME to provide source, e.g., 'Security operations video review studies']

agenticApproach.description: AI-powered safety and security with 24/7 video analytics, real-time incident detection, and predictive risk management achieving significant incident prevention.
characteristics: AI Video Analytics Agent monitors cameras 24/7
Incident Detection Agent identifies safety/security incidents in real-time
Emergency Response Agent notifies security and first responders
Access Control Agent monitors badge activity, flags tailgating
Safety Training Agent auto-enrolls and tracks completion
Safety Inspection Agent guides inspections, flags hazards
Predictive Safety Agent identifies high-risk conditions before incidents
benefits: Video search time reduced significantly (AI finds footage)

projections.basis: TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on real-time AI detection and automated notification of security personnel and first responders']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on AI video analytics automatically identifying and tagging relevant footage by incident type, person, object']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on automated enrollment, tracking, and reminder workflows']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on predictive safety analytics identifying high-risk conditions and proactive interventions before incidents occur']
TBD: [SME to provide logical basis, e.g., 'Based on AI handling routine monitoring, allowing guards to focus on response and high-value tasks']

quickWins: AI video analytics (detect incidents in real-time)
